backgroundInformationList.description: Web - Notice of Repeal and Amend - 158 Sterling Rd

noticeDescription:
IN THE MATTER OF THE ONTARIO HERITAGE ACT

R.S.O. 1990 CHAPTER 0.18 AND

158 STERLING ROAD (Northern Aluminium Company Building)

CITY OF TORONTO, PROVINCE OF ONTARIO

 

NOTICE OF PARTIAL REPEAL AND AMENDMENT OF BY-LAW 969-2005
 

 

Take notice that Toronto City Council passed By-law 425-2022 to partially repeal and amend By-law 969-2005, being a by-law to designate the property at 158 Sterling Road (Northern Aluminium Company Building) as being of cultural heritage value or interest.
title: Notice of Partial Repeal and Amendment of By-Law 969-2005 - 158 Sterling Road
